dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A new terminal in Shymkent, 24 billion tenge—that's a serious investment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A new terminal in Shymkent, twenty four billion tenge-that's a serious investment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new air hub, valued at 24 billion tenge, was constructed using private investment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely, and it's all private money too, which is uh, pretty interesting for a project of that scale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely, and it's all private money too, which is uh, pretty interesting for a project of that scale.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new air hub, valued at 24 billion tenge, was constructed using private investment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're saying it'll bump up the number of routes from what, like, 17 to almost 60?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're saying it'll bump up the number of routes from what, like, seventeen to almost sixty?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to officials, the creation of a unique aviation hub in southern Kazakhstan will increase the number of routes from the region from 17 to 59, including flights to key destinations in Europe and Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, 59 to be exact. That's a huge jump, especially for southern Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, fifty nine to be exact. That's a huge jump, especially for southern Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to officials, the creation of a unique aviation hub in southern Kazakhstan will increase the number of routes from the region from 17 to 59, including flights to key destinations in Europe and Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And President Tokayev was just there inspecting it as part of his working visit, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And President Tokayev was just there inspecting it as part of his working visit, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has inspected the new terminal at Shymkent International Airport, according to Akorda's press service. Earlier today, President Tokayev arrived in Shymkent as part of a working visit aimed at reviewing the city's socio-economic progress.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, he actually directed the project originally to support the city's development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, he actually directed the project originally to support the city's development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The facility was built as part of the President's directive to support the city's development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this isn't brand new though—it opened back on December 25th last year, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this isn't brand new though-it opened back on December twenty fifth last year, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new terminal officially opened on December 25 of last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, late last year. But the real impact is gonna be on connectivity—flights to Europe, Asia, even like France, Germany, China…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, late last year. But the real impact is gonna be on connectivity-flights to Europe, Asia, even like France, Germany, China...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is expected to boost connectivity with neighboring countries as well as with destinations such as France, Germany, China, India, Pakistan, Egypt, Vietnam, and South Korea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And India, Pakistan, Egypt… that's a major expansion for the region that probably needed it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And India, Pakistan, Egypt... that's a major expansion for the region that probably needed it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is expected to boost connectivity with neighboring countries as well as with destinations such as France, Germany, China, India, Pakistan, Egypt, Vietnam, and South Korea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's not just about domestic travel anymore; this turns Shymkent into a proper international hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's not just about domestic travel anymore; this turns Shymkent into a proper international hub.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, flights to Vietnam and South Korea? That's a game-changer for business and tourism.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, flights to Vietnam and South Korea? That's a game-changer for business and tourism.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is expected to boost connectivity with neighboring countries as well as with destinations such as France, Germany, China, India, Pakistan, Egypt, Vietnam, and South Korea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And with Almaty also promoting stuff for foreigners, Kazakhstan's really pushing its aviation infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And with Almaty also promoting stuff for foreigners, Kazakhstan's really pushing its aviation infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Promotion for foreigners to be held at Almaty International Airport

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what's next—maybe even more private investments in other cities?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what's next-maybe even more private investments in other cities?

dialogue_turns.text: Wouldn't be surprised. If this model works, why not replicate it?
